title: kAdali rAdhaiyai
sahitya:
kAdali rAdhaiyaik-kalangaviTTAn malarkkaNNan ivvaNNamE


anupallavi

  yAdava kulAdhipan brndAvanam tanilE ninaindu ninaindu vADum


caraNam 1    kaNNediril vandu naghaippAn kiTTa nerunginAl kuLirmalar
 shOlaiyirkuL Odi oLivAn kanavil vandu kaNNaip-pottuvAn Engum
 kaigaLuk-keTTAmal kuzhalishaiyil mayakki
 
 caraNam 2    gOpiyargaL Ayiram uNDu irundum rAdhaiyiDam ellaiyaTra
 prEmaiyum uNDu mAdhavan pEdai avaLai ettanai shOdanai sheidAn
appappA ADavar manam irumbu melliyar uLLam mezhugum
